overview:
Brian Hahn currently serves as a managing director at Neuberger Berman LLC, an asset management firm with headquarters in New York, and offices in other parts of the globe. He has been affiliated with the company since 1995.

Brian Hahn is involved in Neuberger Berman’s goal of providing an excellent client experience to the individuals and institutions that seek its wealth management services, and expert investment advice and insights. Hahn’s work earned him recognition as one of Barron’s Top Financial Advisors in America.
